About us

At Watch & Services, we’re passionate about precision, craftsmanship, and care. With years of experience in watch repair and maintenance, we specialize in delivering high-quality services that keep your timepieces running flawlessly. From battery replacements and strap adjustments to complete cleaning and restoration, our goal is to combine traditional skill with modern tools to ensure every watch we handle receives the attention it deserves. We work with all major brands — from luxury to everyday wear — and pride ourselves on providing honest pricing, expert advice, and friendly service. Whether you need a quick fix or a detailed restoration, you can trust us to keep your watch ticking beautifully for years to come.

Our Mission

Our Mission is to redefine elegance and precision through craftsmanship that stands the test of time. We are committed to delivering products and experiences that embody quality, authenticity, and innovation. Every design is meticulously crafted with attention to detail, ensuring not only functionality but also an aesthetic that inspires confidence and admiration. We strive to exceed expectations by blending tradition with modernity, offering items that are both timeless and relevant to today’s lifestyle. Our mission is to empower our customers to express their individuality while enjoying the assurance of unparalleled quality. Through continuous innovation, ethical practices, and a dedication to excellence, we aim to create lasting value and make a meaningful impact in the lives of those we serve.To provide reliable, affordable, and expert watch care that combines precision with passion — ensuring every customer leaves with a perfectly working timepiece.

Our Vision

Our Vision is to be recognized as a leader in innovation and quality, setting new standards in our industry while inspiring trust and admiration among our customers. We aspire to create products and experiences that not only meet the needs of today but also anticipate the desires of tomorrow. By combining creativity, sustainability, and precision, we aim to leave a lasting positive impact on our community and the world, empowering individuals to live with confidence, style, and purpose.To become the most trusted name in watch servicing by blending traditional craftsmanship with innovative techniques and unmatched customer satisfaction.

Our Values

  • Quality : Every service is performed with attention to detail.
  • Trust : Transparent pricing and honest recommendations.
  • Expertise : Skilled technicians trained in all major watch brands.
  • Care : We treat your watch like it’s our own.

Why Choose Us

  • Certified and experienced technicians
  • Fast turnaround times
  • Affordable pricing without compromising quality
  • Genuine replacement parts
  • Guaranteed satisfaction
